text: Norman Podhoretz (; born January 16, 1930) is an American magazine editor, writer, and conservative political commentator. He was born in New York City. His views are seen as "paleo-neoconservative".An Interview with Norman Podhoretz April 16, 2019, Claremont He is a writer for Commentary magazine. He was the publication's editor-in-chief from 1960 to 1995. Podhoretz studied at Columbia University and Clare College, Cambridge. He married Midge Decter in 1956. They have two childen. Decter died in 2022.Midge Decter, leading neo- conservative, dead at 94 ==References== Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:American editors Category:American political writers Category:American political commentators Category:Journalists from New York City
